question: Which state govt has signed a MoU with Centres Green Rating for Integrated Habitat Assessment (GRIHA) Council to train state PWD officials to rate govt buildings?
explanation: Maharashtra govt has signed a MoU with Centres Green Rating for Integrated Habitat Assessment (GRIHA) Council to train state PWD officials to rate govt buildings. With this, Maharashtra has become the first state in the country to sign such a MoU. As per the agreement, the GRIHA Council would train PWD's civil & electrical engineers & architects to rate govt buildings as per its parameters.
